text: Joseph Hannesschläger (2 June 1962 - 20 January 2020) was a German actor and musician. He was born in Munich. He played the main role of Chief of Police Korbinian Hofer in Die Rosenheim-Cops from 2002 to 2019. In October 2019, Hannesschläger was diagnosed with neuroendocrine cancer. He died from the disease in Munich on 20 January 2020 at the age of 57.Joseph Hannesschläger ist tot: „Rosenheim Cops“-Star verliert Kampf gegen Krebsleiden ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1962 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from neuroendocrine cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Germany Category:German movie actors Category:German television actors Category:German stage actors Category:German voice actors Category:Musicians from Munich
title: Joseph Hannesschläger
